data.title: Adequate
data.text:
3 of us had lunch in this downtown sandwich place.  I would say the salad I had was ok --there was a relatively small amount of chicken, diced into small pieces, lots of beans and modestly fresh lettuce.  It was nothing special and I would prefer other spots in the future.

Nice sounding selection of sandwiches tho (that just wasn't my inclination today).  Given the other reviews, perhaps that would have been a better choice.

data.title: Great sandwhich choices and beer joint
data.text: Went by for late dinner because of the reviews on here and glad we did. Went with friends that live in Fairfield but had never been and we're glad an out of towner made them go. Says it will be there new sandwhich place. Prices were ok but food was very good. Other things besides sandwiches but that's their specialty and they have some real good and different choices. The food and bar are actually separate. So you do have to pay separately which i wasn't a fan of. Lots of craft beers to choose from and actually no domestics. But I only had a couple $5 pints to take the edge off so it worked fine. Plenty of street parking nearby. Fun place to go.

data.title: Best sandwiches and beer in Fairfield!
data.text: The sandwiches are legit and a great variety to pick from. The bar has some really good beer. The selection changes often.

data.title: Food and drinks are from two different businesses
data.text:
Luigi's is actualy two business partners collaborating under one name.  All the food is made from a kitchen that is separated from the bar, which means two tabs for one meal.  The combined eating area is for both food eaters and bar patrons. The place is one block from the county government building in downtown Fairfield.

The lamb gyro I had was the best I've had in years.  Meat was very tender and the vegetables were all fresh.  The bar tender was very knowledgeable about the beers and let me sample some of the beers from northern California.  

There is a small outdoor seating area where dogs are allowed, but there is no WiFi for customers. Nice place to people watch or talk to locals.

data.title: Great Place to come to for a beer and sandwich
data.text: Oh My Gosh.... this place is amazing. They have some great sandwhiches and their fries are so good.. Love that they change up their beers on tap. Great service and food.

data.title: Best Sandwiches~
data.text: Very fresh...good size portions...fun atmosphere to eat with Sport bar and outdoor seating too for the whole group.

data.title: Great sandwich place
data.text: Craft beers, good sandwiches.  What else could you want?  The atmosphere is nice.  Good service.  Clean.  I like their life of tri sandwich.  Very tasty!

data.title: Great sandwich, burgers and beer
data.text: Very friendly. I had the doc Holiday burger. My other family members had sandwiches. We all enjoyed the food. There is a small bar and seating area. Set up like a locals hidden spot.

data.title: Nice lunch
data.text: I have stopped in here a number of times for lunch. Food is always good and the staff is friendly. They will make off the menu items if you ask. The menu is vast so in most cases I'm sure you'll find a sandwich that fits you wants. The price is right for lunch. The sign also says that beer and wine are coming soon.

data.title: Yummy, yum, yum!
data.text: My husband and I stopped here in our way to Redding. Clean restaurant. Awesome selection of bottled soda. I had a vanilla soda and number 1 on the menu. It's was delish. My husband had the number 13 with fries. Again, very tasty! Would definitely recommend this deli to anyone in the area.

data.title: Delicious sandwiches and sides
data.text: After walking around for a while, I decided to try this restaurant as I was in between job interviews. I tried the wild hog and in a word...DELICIOUS. the mix of pulled pork with ham, gouda cheese, pickles and cole slaw was absolutely devine. The only thing that could have made the sandwich better would have been jalapenos or some other way to add a little spice. Maybe an onion bun would have also added a little zing. The side salad offerings were also numerous and tasty as was the selection of chips and special soda's. Over all very good. I rate this as an A++

data.title: Sandwiches Filling and Generous
data.text: We cleaned our own table and exchanged our empty napkin holder for a full one on another table.  Upon my entering the bathroom after our daughter exiting she let me know there wasn't any toilet paper.  It wasn't busy when we were there.  The sandwiches were all quite good and servings generous.
